---

import { Card, CardGrid } from "@astrojs/starlight/components";

## Why bother?

<CardGrid stagger>
  <Card title="Definition pop-up" icon="document">
    Highlight some text in any application, press a hotkey, and see a window
    appear next to your word with all its definitions!
  </Card>
  <Card title="Supports multiple languages" icon="list-format">
    Search across as many dictionaries in as many languages as you can handle!
    You can even click any word in the definition to jump from one language to
    another.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Low-carbon" icon="sun">
    Why make tons of web requests every time you need to define a word? Here
    everything happens offline and the app itself doesn't use much resources!
  </Card>
</CardGrid>
